channel.title: PyMol on Huilin Li
channel.description: Recent content in PyMol on Huilin Li

item.title: PyMol commands
item.description: select residues based on residue number select nterm, resi 42+74+43+56+39 mutate one amino acid cmd.wizard("mutagenesis") cmd.fetch("target.pdb") cmd.get_wizard().set_mode("LEU") cmd.get_wizard().do_select("chain A and resid 22") cmd.get_wizard().apply() cmd.save("mutated_target.pdb")
